definitions.definition: Dreadful; causing terror, alarm and fear; awesome
definitions.example: The witch gave him a terrible curse.

definitions.definition: Intense; extreme in degree or extent.
definitions.example: He paid a terrible price for his life of drinking.
The food was terrible, but it was free.
Whatever he thinks, he is a terrible driver.

definitions.definition: In a terrible way; to a terrible extent; terribly; awfully.
